page.title: 05UPHAM C.of E. PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The original school was set up in 1815 in the old building where brushes were made. In 1962 the new one was built. It has a central hall with classrooms, kitchen and office,etc. round the edge rather like a honeycomb. The school is divided into three classes at present, there being 79 children. The school colours are burgundy, white and grey. There are three teachers, a secretary, a caretaker and a cook. It takes the cook three hours to prepare and cook lunch for everyone. It is quite hard work but she says she enjoys it. The grounds of the school are used for games lessons, environmental studies and play-times.
